description: Reusable UI components for consistent design patterns across the POS application including specialized dialogs, search fields, and service display widgets

components.CashDrawerDialog: Comprehensive cash drawer management dialog with PIN protection, denomination counting, and audit trail functionality.

components.CashDrawerOperation: Enumeration defining cash drawer operations (open, drop, pickup, count) with descriptions and icons.

rules: Comprehensive cash drawer management with PIN-protected operations requiring manager authorization.
Four distinct operation types: open drawer, cash drop, cash pickup, and cash count with context-specific UI.
Denomination-based cash counting with automatic total calculation supporting bills and coins.
Form validation with predefined reason selection and custom reason input for audit compliance.
Privileged operations integration ensuring proper authorization before cash drawer access.
Professional Material Design dialog with consistent styling and error handling.
Factory constructors for each operation type simplifying dialog instantiation.
Comprehensive input validation preventing invalid amounts and ensuring required fields.
Real-time discount percentage calculation and visual feedback for cash count operations.
Audit trail support with reasons, notes, and employee tracking for compliance requirements.

components.CompactServicesDisplay: Space-efficient service display showing service pills for first items and icons for overflow.

components.UltraCompactServicesDisplay: Ultra-compact variant displaying all services as icons for maximum space efficiency.

rules: Space-efficient service display optimizing for limited UI space while maintaining service visibility.
Configurable pill display count with automatic overflow to icon-only display for remaining services.
Dual display modes: standard compact (pills + icons) and ultra compact (icons only).
Service categorization integration using ServicePill and ServiceCategoryIcon components.
Responsive sizing support with small and extra-small pill variants for different layout requirements.
Empty state handling with graceful degradation when no services are provided.
Wrap layout ensuring proper text flow and responsive behavior across screen sizes.

components.CustomerSearchField: Advanced customer search field with real-time search, overlay dropdown, and customer selection functionality.

rules: Real-time customer search with debounced input preventing excessive database queries.
Overlay dropdown displaying search results with customer avatars and contact information.
Search trigger threshold requiring minimum 2 characters before initiating search operations.
Repository integration with DriftCustomerRepository for comprehensive customer data access.
Focus management with automatic overlay show/hide based on field focus state.
Customer selection callback with complete customer model data for parent component integration.
Loading state indication during search operations with visual feedback.
Clear functionality allowing users to reset search and clear selected customer.
Form validation ensuring customer selection before form submission.
Professional UI design with Material Design principles and consistent theming.

components.OptimizedServiceCategoryIcon: Performance-optimized service category icon widget using MobX store integration with fallback behavior.

components.ServiceCategoryIconProvider: InheritedWidget providing ServiceCategoryStore context to descendant widgets.

components.ServiceCategoryIcon: Wrapper widget automatically using provided category store from context.

rules: Performance-optimized category icon display with MobX store integration for real-time category updates.
InheritedWidget pattern providing ServiceCategoryStore context throughout widget subtree.
Fallback behavior generating color and icon when store data is unavailable.
Dynamic category ID support accepting both integer and string identifiers.
Heuristic-based icon selection when service category data is incomplete.
Tooltip support providing additional context about services and categories.
Configurable sizing and tooltip visibility for different UI contexts.
Color generation algorithm ensuring consistent visual representation when database categories unavailable.
Provider pattern implementation for clean dependency injection and testing support.

components.PriceOverrideDialog: Comprehensive price override dialog with PIN protection, discount calculation, and audit trail for service price modifications.

rules: PIN-protected price override functionality ensuring manager authorization for price modifications.
Real-time discount percentage calculation with visual feedback for price changes.
Predefined reason selection with custom reason input for comprehensive audit trail.
Quick discount buttons (10%, 20% off) for common pricing scenarios.
Price validation preventing negative values and ensuring valid currency formats.
Visual price difference indication showing increase/decrease amounts and percentages.
Service information display providing context for the price override operation.
Professional dialog design with consistent Material Design styling and error handling.
Form validation ensuring all required fields are completed before processing.
Integration with PrivilegedOperations system for secure price modification workflow.

components.ServiceCategoryIcon: Compact service category icon widget with category mapping and fallback icon generation.

rules: Compact icon representation for service categories with minimal space usage.
Category ID mapping supporting both integer and string category identifiers for backward compatibility.
Service name-based category guessing when explicit category ID is not provided.
ServiceCategories configuration integration for consistent color and icon theming.
Tooltip support providing service name or category information on hover.
Configurable sizing and tooltip visibility for different UI layout requirements.
Fallback icon selection based on service name patterns for robust category detection.
Consistent visual styling with rounded corners and color-coded backgrounds.

components.ServicePill: Pill-shaped service display widget with color-coded categories, multiple sizing options, and intelligent text contrast.

rules: Pill-shaped service display with consistent color coding based on service categories.
Multiple sizing variants (normal, small, extra-small) for different UI layout requirements.
LookupService integration for dynamic category color resolution.
Intelligent text contrast calculation ensuring readability across all color backgrounds.
Service name-based category detection when explicit category ID is unavailable.
HSL color manipulation for optimal text contrast and professional appearance.
Backward compatibility supporting both integer and string category identifiers.
Responsive typography scaling based on pill size variant.

components.StandardAppHeader: Comprehensive standardized AppBar component with search functionality, action buttons, and consistent styling across all screens.

components.HeaderActionStyles: Predefined action button styles for common POS operations.

rules: Standardized AppBar ensuring consistent header design across all application screens.
Factory constructors for common header patterns (add actions, navigation, management screens).
Debounced search functionality with configurable search hints and real-time search callbacks.
Multiple action button types: colored, outlined, subtle, and icon-only with consistent styling.
Performance optimization with RepaintBoundary isolation preventing unnecessary repaints.
Flexible action system supporting primary actions, secondary actions, and search integration.
Professional button styling with consistent padding, colors, and typography throughout.
Predefined styles for common POS operations (check-in, checkout, calendar, register, save).
Extension methods providing quick configuration for management and calendar-integrated screens.
Search widget integration with proper focus management and clear functionality.

components.StatusBadge: Compact status badge widget for displaying customer types, appointment status, and service categories with consistent styling.

rules: Factory constructors for common status types (walk-in, appointment, group service, assigned) with predefined colors and icons.
Flexible badge design supporting custom text, background colors, and optional icons.
Consistent styling with rounded corners, appropriate padding, and professional appearance.
Icon integration with conditional display and standardized sizing.
Color-coded status representation improving visual scanning and status identification.
Compact design minimizing space usage while maintaining readability.
